Abyssal Rend.name: Abyssal Rend
Abyssal Rend.flavor: Channeling the Abyss’s evil, your fingertips tear through your foe’s armor and flesh—more so if you can smell its blood.
keywords: Melee touch  Target: One creature  Attack: Strength or Intelligence + 6 vs. Fortitude
Abyssal Rend.attack:
Strength or Intelligence + 6 vs. Fortitude
Level 21: Strength or Intelligence + 9 vs. Fortitude
Abyssal Rend.onHit: 3d10 + Strength or Intelligence modifier damage. If the target is bloodied, it takes 1d10 extra damage.

Abyssal Command.name: Abyssal Command
Abyssal Command.flavor: As the Abyss stains your bloodline, you corrupt another’s body and mind.
Abyssal Command.onHit:
2d10 + Strength or Intelligence modifier damage, and the target is dominated (save ends). If the target is a demon, it takes a –2 penalty to saving throws against this effect.
Aftereffect: The target is dazed (save ends).

Demonskin Meditation.name: Demonskin Meditation
Demonskin Meditation.flavor: You wrap yourself in a sheathe of demon’s energy, protecting yourself from a variety of elements.
keywords: Personal   Effect: Choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. You gain resistance to that damage type equal to one-half your level until the end of the encounter.
Demonskin Meditation.effect: Choose a damage type: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder. You gain resistance to that damage type equal to one-half your level until the end of the encounter.
